name: Bitcoin Or Bomb?
description:
Terrorists plant the bombs throughout the city, but they do not require a money for bomb defuse. They offer to play an unusual game - the policemen need to find all the hidden bitcoins around the city for a certain amount of time, if they find it - terrorists defuse the bombs, and if they do not find it - they explode bombs. However, among the bitcoins are also hidden bombs. And if the police find bombs - they also explode.
You are playing for the FDB agent (Federal defense of the Bitcoins), and you need to find all the bitcoins, before the time runs out and the bombs explode
-The atmosphere, is not enough time, and you need to find all the bitcoins, while not finding a bomb, otherwise everything will explode.
-Many levels (The closer to the end, the less time and more bombs among the bitcoins)
-You will be able be the policemen and save the city, as well as find the bitcoins
-Good soundtrack
-Steam achievements
